entry.source: {F812}Female neurisher\0{F87A,106}{F813,1,403501}You know, I can't see, but my ears work{F801}fine. He's{F801}good at suppressing his real feelings...{F801}{F802}He probably had to force himself to{F801}toughen up and fight after he became{F801}a demonoid...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Male neurisher\0{F87A,105}{F813,1,403212}I know it was my own decision, but{F801}becoming a neurisher was such a{F801}terrible idea...{F801}{F802}I feel like a cow or something... entry.source: {F812}Male neurisher\0{F87A,105}{F813,1,403212}Around the time Kenji, who'd just become{F801}a demonoid, defeated the demon in{F801}Ichigaya and became King of Tokyo...{F801}{F802}He declared that all residents of Tokyo{F801}must choose to become either neurishers{F801}or demonoids.{F801}{F802}Kenji's men took all the normal humans{F801}left in Tokyo to Ichigaya...{F801}{F802}There, we were forced to undergo{F801}surgery. Of course, he let us choose{F801}which operation we wanted...{F801}
